game.title: Cookie Clicker – Play Online
name: Cookie Clicker
cookie-clicker
game.s_dis: Cookie Clicker is an iconic idle game where you click a giant cookie to bake more cookies, unlock upgrades, and build an ever-growing cookie empire.
game.l_dis:
Play Cookie Clicker Online – The Original Idle Game

Cookie Clicker is a legendary incremental idle game where your main goal is simple — click a giant cookie to bake more cookies! Each cookie you bake can be used to buy upgrades and buildings that produce cookies automatically. The more you bake, the faster your cookie empire grows.

What is Cookie Clicker?

Cookie Clicker was created by Orteil in 2013 and became one of the most famous idle games of all time. The game starts with a single cookie and evolves into a vast production empire with buildings like Grandmas, Farms, Factories, and even Portals and Time Machines to boost cookie output.

How to Play Cookie Clicker

  • Click the Giant Cookie: Each click produces one cookie.
  • Buy Buildings: Spend cookies on assets like Grandmas, Farms, and Factories that generate cookies automatically.
  • Unlock Upgrades: Boost your efficiency with powerful upgrades and bonuses.
  • Ascend and Rebirth: Reset your progress for long-term multipliers through the Ascension system.

Why Play Cookie Clicker Online?

Playing Cookie Clicker online allows you to jump straight into baking cookies anytime, anywhere — no installation required. The simple gameplay loop is surprisingly satisfying, making it a perfect mix of idle fun and strategic management.

Key Features

  • Addictive Incremental Gameplay: Watch your numbers grow endlessly.
  • Automatic Production: Hire grandmas and build cookie factories.
  • Endless Progression: No limits — keep baking forever!
  • Achievements and Upgrades: Unlock milestones and secret boosts.
  • Free to Play: Available online with no downloads required.

Start Baking Cookies Today!

Play Cookie Clicker now and see how massive your cookie empire can become. Click, upgrade, ascend — and let the cookies roll in!
